name: UEnhancedPlayerMappableKeyProfile
doc: Represents one "Profile" that a user can have for their player mappable keys

ProfileIdentifier: The ID of this profile. This can be used by each Key Mapping to filter down which profile is required for it be equipped.
OwningUserId: The platform user id of the owning Local Player of this profile.
PlayerMappedKeys:
A map of "Mapping Row Name" to all key mappings associated with it.
Note: Dirty mappings will be serialized from UEnhancedInputUserSettings::Serialize
DisplayName: The localized display name of this profile

methods.name: DoesMappingPassQueryOptions
methods.doc: Returns true if the given player key mapping passes the query filter provided.

methods.name: DumpProfileToLog
methods.doc: A helper function to print out all the current profile settings to the log.

methods.name: GetPlayerMappingRows
methods.doc:
Get all known key mappings for this profile.

This returns a map of "Mapping Name" -> Player Mappings to that name

methods.name: GetProfileDisplayName
methods.doc: Get the localized display name for this profile

methods.name: ResetMappingToDefault
methods.doc: Resets every player key mapping to this mapping back to it's default value

methods.name: ResetToDefault
methods.doc: Resets all the key mappings in this profile to their default value from their Input Mapping Context.

methods.name: ToString
methods.doc: Returns a string that can be used to debug the current key mappings.
